PrivacyViolationsSection.title: Grok tracks, shares, and monitors your chats. Internxt protects it.
PrivacyViolationsSection.description: Grok may be secure, but itâ€™s a nightmare for your privacy. Switch to Internxt AI for secure, private conversations that remain fully confidential and encrypted.

titles: Your chats can be seen by X
Conversations are stored on Xâ€™s servers
descriptions: Grok may use chat inputs to train and refine its AI models, and some conversations may be reviewed by human staff, creating a risk that personal conversations may be seen by X employees.
Grok chats and metadata such as device information, language, and feedback are stored in your X account activity and retained by default for extended periods, limiting user control over data.
Because Grok is integrated with X, interactions may be linked to your public profile and expose personal interests or opinions, increasing risks such as harassment or reputational harm.
By default, Grok chats are not end-to-end encrypted, allowing X to access and process conversations and potentially compromising confidentiality.

WhyNeedAlternativeSection.title: Why you need a private Grok alternative
WhyNeedAlternativeSection.description: What Grok demonstrates in security fails in terms of privacy. Get total security and encrypted chats with Internxt AI.

descriptions: Even when opting out of training, authorized personnel may still review Grok chats. Because Grok is embedded within X, prompts and interactions may be tied to social accounts and broader platform policies.
Without end-to-end encryption, Grok conversations remain readable by platform systems and employees, exposing confidential information to potential misuse or breaches.
Grok may automatically use user posts and interactions on X to train artificial intelligence models, increasing large-scale data harvesting risks.

VersusSection.title: Internxt AI vs Grok
VersusSection.description: Internxt offers unrivaled privacy and security thanks to zero-knowledge, post-quantum encryption, giving you the best protection from cyberattacks.

freePlanCard.description: Use Internxt AI for free with private encrypted conversations

faq.question: Is Internxt AI a more secure and private Grok alternative?
answer: Yes, Internxt encrypts all your chats and never stores your conversations. Grok does not encrypt chats and may use them to train its AI.
Internxt also includes Drive, VPN, Antivirus, Cleaner, Meet, and Mail to provide additional protection against hackers and data breaches.

faq.question: Is Internxt AI free to use?
answer: Yes, you can use Internxt AI for free without logging in or providing personal information or payment details.

faq.question: What is post-quantum encryption, and is it more secure?
answer: Post-quantum encryption is designed to resist future quantum attacks, making it a more secure alternative to standard encryption.
Internxt uses this technology to protect your data and lifetime storage plans against future cybersecurity threats at no extra cost.

faq.question: Where is Internxt based?
answer: Internxt is based in Valencia, Spain, and complies with GDPR and strict European privacy laws to protect your data.

faq.question: Is Grok more expensive than Internxt?
answer: Internxt AI is free to use, and with your exclusive {{percentage}}% discount, all plans are cheaper while offering secure cloud storage and a complete privacy suite.

faq.question: How do I contact support?
answer: If you need assistance, contact hello@internxt.com and our Customer Success Team will be happy to help.

faq.question: Can I add more storage to my lifetime plan?
answer: Yes, you can upgrade your plan from your Internxt account settings or purchase additional plans and your storage will stack automatically.

faq.question: Can I pay with credit card, PayPal, or cryptocurrency?
answer: Internxt accepts debit and credit cards (Mastercard, VISA, American Express), PayPal, iDEAL, Sofort, Cryptocurrency, and Klarna.
